name: Cajun Chicken Alfredo
description: A creamy and delicious pasta dish featuring tender cajun chicken and savory Alfredo sauce.
ingredients: 8 oz. fettuccine pasta (cooked according to package directions and drained)

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic homemade Margherita Pizza recipe, perfect for a fun night in with family and friends.

name: Bacon Blue Cheese Burger
description: Indulge in the ultimate burger experience with this sizzling Bacon Blue Cheeseburger - a juicy patty topped with crispy bacon and rich, tangy blue cheese crumbles, guaranteed to satisfy your cravings and elevate your taste buds to new heights!
ingredients: 2 lb. ground chuck (freshly, at least 80% lean, a.k.a. 80/20)

name: Mac and Cheese
description: Get ready to dive into a bowl of creamy, cheesy goodness with our mouth-watering Mac and Cheese.

name: Pasta Bolognese
description: A classic dish that's been perfected with tender pasta and a savory meat sauce simmered to perfection. Bursting with bold flavors and comforting aromas, this recipe is sure to satisfy your cravings for a delicious, authentic Italian meal.
ingredients: 1 cup red wine (a good hearty red like Cabernet Sauvignon, Zinfandel, or a blend)
56 oz. tomatoes (good quality Italian whole, look for San Marzano tomatoes)

name: Garlic Butter Steak and Shrimp
description: Succulent shrimp and perfectly seared steak, bathed in a mouthwatering garlic butter sauce that's sure to make your heart skip a beat! This impressive yet easy-to-make dish is the perfect choice for a special occasion or a weekend indulgence.
ingredients: 2 steaks (lean New York Steak strip, or steak of choice)

name: Steak and Eggs Hash
description: A hearty breakfast dish that's sure to fuel your day ahead! Featuring savory strips of tender steak, perfectly cooked eggs, and a medley of colorful veggies, this protein-packed recipe is the ultimate breakfast of champions that's both satisfying and delicious.

name: Clean Eggs Benedict
description: A classic breakfast dish that's been taken to new heights! Featuring perfectly poached eggs, crispy bacon, and a rich and creamy hollandaise sauce, all served on a toasted English muffin, this recipe is the ultimate indulgence that's sure to impress your guests and leave your taste buds singing.
ingredients: 4 whole grain English muffins (split and toasted)

name: Ham and Eggs Cups
description: A fun and easy way to enjoy a classic combination! Featuring savory slices of ham cradling perfectly cooked eggs, this recipe is both delicious and cute, making it perfect for brunch or breakfast on-the-go. With just a few simple ingredients, you can whip up a batch of these tasty cups and enjoy a protein-packed start to your day.

name: Sausage, Hashbrowns and Eggs Casserole
description: a hearty breakfast dish that's perfect for feeding a crowd! Featuring layers of savory sausage, crispy hashbrowns, fluffy scrambled eggs, and gooey melted cheese, this casserole is the ultimate comfort food that's sure to satisfy your hunger and warm your soul. Whether you're hosting a brunch or looking for a comforting breakfast to start your day, this recipe is a must-try that will have everyone coming back for seconds.
ingredients: 1 lb. italian sausage (I prefer hot, but mild or sweet also work)
1 red bell pepper (cored and diced, or 1 jar of roasted red peppers, drained and diced)
20 oz. frozen hash browns (thawed, I used the cubed kind)

name: Classic Southern Deviled Eggs
description: Southern Charm in Every Bite: Classic Deviled Eggs Done Right!

name: Steak Tacos
description: Spice Up Your Taco Night with Juicy and Flavorful Steak Tacos!
ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. steak (Denver, flank steak, or skirt steak)
12 corn tortillas (I used 2 tortillas per taco)

name: Steak Quesadilla
description: Get ready for a sizzling fiesta in your mouth with this Steak Quesadilla recipe - tender strips of juicy steak, melted cheese, and fresh veggies layered between golden tortillas for a flavor-packed meal that's quick and easy to make!
ingredients: steak (Or a, your choice: Skirt steak, hanger steak, flat iron, flat iron, etc.)
1 chipotle (dried, mecco, substitute 1 chipotle in adobo)

name: Philly Cheese Steak
description: Indulge in the ultimate cheesy, meaty goodness with our mouthwatering Philly Cheese Steak recipe - packed with tender beef, saut√©ed onions, and melted provolone cheese, all nestled inside a perfectly toasted hoagie roll!
ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. ribeye (may sub top sirloin or skirt steak, very thinly sliced*)
3/4 cup grated sharp cheddar cheese (freshly, or more to taste)
1/3 cup peppers (roughly chopped jarred cherry, pimento, optional)
1/2 tsp. garlic (EACH, pwdr, onion pwdr, dried thyme, dried parsley)
